text: Va agar [Alloh taolo] ʙaroi mardum, ʙadiro ʙo hamon sitoʙ mexost, ki onon nekiro mexohand [va nafrinhoe, ki dar haqqi xud va amvolu farzandonason mekunand, mustacoʙ mekard], hatman, acalason faro rasida ʙud. Pas, kasonero ki ʙa didori Mo umed [-u ʙovar] nadorand, vomeguzorem, to dar [gumrohi va] sarkasijason sargardon ʙimonand
